name: Spooky Beat
description:
A very funny rhythm game with cute characters and simple mechanics. It's a game which requires reflex and agility to achieve the best performance.

"Sad Code" Team:

Angela Mendonça Vieira - 2D Artist
Fernanda Losekann Rediske - UI / Animator
Lhaion Alexandre de Moraes Almeida - Sound Designer
Lucas Naspolini Ribeiro - Programmer
